import React, { useState } from "react"; function Edit(props) { const { student, styles } = props; const [edit, setEdit] = useState({ ...student }); function editHandler(e) { return setEdit({ ...edit, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } return ( <>
Name
Age
{student.age}
Password
{student.password}
Address
{student.address}
); } export default Edit;
